name: SynthFont2 Arrangement File
summary: An S2ARR file is an arrangement file created by SynthFont2, a program used to edit and play .MIDI files. It contains an arrangement for a MIDI file, which includes one or more SoundFont banks ( .SF2 files), instruments, and effects. S2ARR files also include playback settings, such as volume, playback range, and beats per minute (BPM).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
